#summary selectTag(name,value,options[label,wrapLabel,prepend,append,prependToLabel,appendToLabel,errorElement,includeBlank,multiple,valueField,textField])
#labels chapter,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Builds and returns a string containing a select form control based on the supplied `name` and `options`. 

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true ||  || See documentation for `textFieldTag` ||
|| *value* || string || true || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| * options* || struct, query, array or list || true || || A collection to populate the select form control with ||
|| *label* || string || false || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *wrapLabel* || boolean || false || true || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *prepend* || string || false || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *append* || string || false || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *prependToLabel* || string || false || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *appendToLabel* || string || false || || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| *errorElement* || string || false || div || See documentation for `textFieldTag ` ||
|| * includeBlank* || boolean || false || false || Whether to include a blank option in the select form control ||
|| * multiple* || boolean || false || false || Whether to allow multiple selection of options in the select form control ||
|| * valueField* || string || false || id || The column to use for the value of each list element, used only when a query has been supplied in the `options` argument ||
|| * textField* || string || false || name || The column to use for the value of each list element that the end user will see, used only when a query has been supplied in the `options` argument ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- controller code --->
<cfset cities = model("City").findAll()>

<!--- view code --->
<cfoutput>
  <p>#selectTag(name="cityId", options= cities)#</p>
</cfoutput>
}}}
